content.raw:
But it is not generated, it is empty in the thumbnails directory.
With the following error:
```
gzserver: /build/ogre-1.9-mqY1wq/ogre-1.9-1.9.0+dfsg1/OgreMain/src/OgreRenderSystem.cpp:546: virtual voidOgre::RenderSystem::setDepthBufferFor(Ogre::RenderTarget*): Assertion `bAttached && "A new DepthBuffer for a RenderTarget was created, but after creation" "it says it's incompatible with that RT"' failed.
./tools/gzthumbnails.sh: line 6: 24730 Aborted                 (core dumped) gzserver -s libModelPropShop.so $DIR/green.world --propshop-save "$ASSETS/${dir##*/}/thumbnails" --propshop-model "$ASSETS/${dir##*/}/model.sdf" --verbose
convert: unable to open image `/home/shady/CodeBase/gzweb/tools/../http/client/assets/arm_part/thumbnails/1.png': No such file or directory @ error/blob.c/OpenBlob/2712.
```


problem solved: It is related to headless environment, since I ssh to my local vm to generate those thumbnails.
